name: Daniel Mercer
investment_thesis: Invests in early-stage AI-driven enterprise software solving measurable operational inefficiencies. Prioritizes companies demonstrating early product-led growth and strong customer validation.
background: Former senior engineering manager at Atlassian with a decade of experience in cloud infrastructure, DevOps, and enterprise developer tooling.
evaluation_criteria: Potential for integrations and ecosystem expansion
personality_type: Analytical, detail-oriented, prefers demos over theory.
support_level: Hands-on during first 6–12 months with GTM, hiring, and product roadmap.
contact_policy: Accepts cold outreach if concise and metrics-driven.

name: Sophia Müller
investment_thesis: Backs deep tech and B2B SaaS companies with strong IP defensibility and clear commercialization paths in the EU and US markets.
background: Previously a principal at a pan-European growth equity firm and an early engineer at a Berlin-based SaaS unicorn.
evaluation_criteria: Clear roadmap to Series B metrics
personality_type: Structured thinker, data-driven, appreciates concise communication.
support_level: Active board member with regular strategy sessions and hiring support.
contact_policy: Prefers warm introductions but reads concise cold emails with clear traction data.

name: Liam O’Connor
investment_thesis: Invests in financial infrastructure and regulatory technology that simplify compliance for SMEs and fintechs in regulated markets.
background: Former head of risk at a European digital bank and advisor to multiple Irish fintech accelerators.
evaluation_criteria: Domain expertise in the founding team
personality_type: Pragmatic, informal, prefers honest discussions over polished pitches.
support_level: Hands-on for the first 6 months, especially with compliance and banking partnerships.
contact_policy: Introductions via founders he has backed are strongly preferred.

name: Elena Marino
investment_thesis: Supports mobility, robotics, and automation startups that modernize physical infrastructure and logistics networks.
background: Mechanical engineer by training, with 8 years in a European industrial automation conglomerate before moving into venture.
personality_type: Direct, detail-focused, enjoys visiting factories and warehouses more than boardrooms.
support_level: Hands-on with enterprise sales strategy and intros into European industrial networks.
contact_policy: Open to cold outreach that includes a short product video and clear customer use cases.

name: Henrik Sörensen
investment_thesis: Invests in climate tech, clean manufacturing, and software that reduces emissions and resource waste in traditional industries.
background: Industrial engineer with prior experience in sustainability consulting and a Nordic climate-focused accelerator.
evaluation_criteria: Willingness to pay from large enterprises
personality_type: Calm, methodical, prefers thoughtful founders over aggressive salesmanship.
support_level: Regular check-ins, fundraising support, and help with corporate partnerships.
contact_policy: Warm introductions preferred; responds to decks that highlight climate impact metrics.

name: Chloé Bernard
investment_thesis: Bets on consumer AI, digital wellness, and productivity products that build daily habits and strong user retention.
background: Former product lead at a Paris-based consumer app scale-up with a focus on growth and retention.
personality_type: Empathetic, design-driven, cares deeply about user experience.
support_level: Hands-on for product and UX feedback, light on operations.
contact_policy: Open to well-crafted cold DMs on LinkedIn and Twitter with a demo link.

name: Jan van Leeuwen
investment_thesis: Invests in SMB-focused SaaS, workflow automation, and no-code platforms that replace spreadsheets.
background: Ex-founder of an exited SaaS company serving European SMEs, now a full-time investor.
personality_type: Practical, founder-friendly, focused on clear execution plans.
support_level: Very involved for the first year, especially on GTM and pricing.
contact_policy: Warm intros preferred; occasionally sources via SaaS founder communities.

name: Public Investor
investment_thesis: Invests in AI infrastructure, cybersecurity, and enterprise automation tools emerging from Central and Eastern Europe.
background: Background in computer science and prior experience at a global cybersecurity vendor.
evaluation_criteria: Clear expansion path beyond home market
personality_type: Technical, skeptical of buzzwords, likes live demos and code-level discussions.
support_level: Offers deep technical and hiring support; less active on day-to-day operations.
contact_policy: Reviews cold inbound from CEE founders, especially those with open-source traction.

name: Ralf Becker
investment_thesis: Focuses on fintech, digital identity, and wealth management tools targeting high-net-worth individuals and SMEs.
background: Former private banker and head of digital innovation at a Swiss financial institution.
personality_type: Reserved, thorough, prefers in-person meetings for final decisions.
support_level: Light but reliable; strong for introductions in banking and wealth management circles.
contact_policy: Typically invests via referrals from other fintech investors and founders.

name: Greta Johansen
investment_thesis: Backs climate resilience, water tech, and green logistics startups addressing infrastructure challenges in developed markets.
background: Environmental engineer with a master’s degree in sustainable infrastructure and previous work at a Nordic development agency.
personality_type: Mission-driven, collaborative, values humility and clarity.
support_level: Provides active support on impact measurement, public funding, and international expansion.
contact_policy: Accepts cold outreach that clearly articulates both climate impact and business case.

name: Private Investor
investment_thesis: Invests in B2B AI SaaS and applied cybersecurity solutions replacing legacy enterprise software in regulated industries.
background: Former consultant at a global strategy firm and later VP Product at a cybersecurity scale-up.
evaluation_criteria: Strong technical and commercial co-founder pairing
personality_type: Analytical, expects well-prepared metrics and a clear roadmap.
support_level: Highly engaged during go-to-market build-out and key hiring phases.
contact_policy: Prefers warm introductions via founders, operators, or other investors.

name: Private Investor
investment_thesis: Invests in gaming tools, applied AI in consumer entertainment, and XR interfaces for immersive experiences.
background: Former game designer and studio lead at a well-known Nordic gaming company.
evaluation_criteria: Team with shipped titles or prototypes
personality_type: Creative, informal, enjoys brainstorming sessions and early product tests.
support_level: Hands-on product feedback; limited involvement in operations and fundraising.
contact_policy: Open to cold emails from teams with a playable build or prototype.

name: Public Investor
investment_thesis: Invests in e-commerce infrastructure, logistics automation, and marketplace tooling that enable cross-border trade.
background: Previously COO of an Iberian logistics marketplace and mentor at multiple European accelerators.
evaluation_criteria: Strong understanding of fulfillment and last-mile challenges
personality_type: Operationally minded, honest, prefers realism over hype.
support_level: Deeply involved on processes, operations, and marketplace liquidity challenges.
contact_policy: Takes introductions from logistics and commerce operators he trusts.

name: Venture Capitalist
investment_thesis: Invests in fintech infrastructure, compliance, and payments automation for mid-market and enterprise customers.
background: Former product manager at Stripe focusing on compliance and treasury products.
evaluation_criteria: Clear pain point in financial operations
personality_type: Fast-paced, straightforward, expects crisp metrics and roadmap clarity.
support_level: Hands-on with GTM, enterprise sales, and US expansion for European teams.
contact_policy: Responds to concise cold outreach that shows traction and clarity on ICP.

name: Venture Capitalist
investment_thesis: Invests in smart cities, GovTech, and public sector automation addressing large-scale infrastructure and citizen services.
background: Former policy advisor and digital transformation lead at a Gulf government entity.
evaluation_criteria: Alignment with policy and regulatory priorities
Ability to navigate long sales cycles
Scalability to multiple municipalities or countries
personality_type: Diplomatic, patient, values founders who understand public sector dynamics.
support_level: Deeply involved in public sector introductions and pilot design.
contact_policy: Warm intros preferred; occasionally reviews GovTech-focused accelerator cohorts.

name: Haruto Sato
investment_thesis: Invests in robotics, industrial automation, and AI-powered manufacturing technologies improving quality and throughput.
background: Former engineering director at a Japanese industrial robot manufacturer.
personality_type: Technical, measured, prefers on-site demos where possible.
support_level: Hands-on with technical architecture and intros to Asian manufacturing partners.
contact_policy: Typically invests alongside trusted seed funds; open to intros from European industrial VCs.

name: Venture Capitalist
investment_thesis: Invests in AI models for scientific computing, research commercialization, and precision agriculture.
background: Physics PhD turned VC, previously built a research software spin-out from a European university.
evaluation_criteria: Strong link to validated scientific research
Clear path from prototype to product
Market willing to pay for accuracy and reliability
personality_type: Curious, detail-oriented, enjoys whiteboard sessions with technical founders.
support_level: Highly engaged on positioning, IP strategy, and early customer development.
contact_policy: Prefers introductions from academics, incubators, or other deep tech investors.

name: Public Investor
investment_thesis: Invests in SaaS workflow automation, logistics optimization, and industrial IoT solutions arising from the Baltics and surrounding regions.
background: Background in industrial engineering and prior operator experience at a Baltic SaaS scale-up.
evaluation_criteria: Potential for regional and EU-wide expansion
personality_type: Hands-on, pragmatic, prefers clear KPIs and dashboards.
support_level: Active on GTM, especially channel partnerships and integrations.
contact_policy: Open to cold outreach from Baltic and CEE founders with early traction.

name: Leo Carter
investment_thesis: Invests exclusively in AI-native products disrupting legacy enterprise workflows across sectors like finance, operations, and customer support.
background: Former engineering leader at a North American AI scale-up focusing on enterprise automation.
evaluation_criteria: Clear AI advantage over rule-based systems
personality_type: Analytical, direct, expects live product demos and user stories.
support_level: Very active on product strategy and AI roadmap for the first 12 months.
contact_policy: Open to cold outreach with a working product and initial metrics.

name: Camila Duarte
investment_thesis: Invests in logistics, mobility, and supply chain innovation in growing markets, with potential to expand into Europe.
background: Previously led operations at a Brazilian logistics scale-up and advises multiple mobility startups.
evaluation_criteria: Demonstrated ability to operate in complex logistics environments
Unit economics that improve with scale
Potential to expand from LatAm into Europe
Resilient founding team with on-the-ground experience
personality_type: Operator-minded, energetic, appreciates founders who understand field realities.
support_level: Deeply involved in operations and local partnerships; moderate involvement in fundraising.
contact_policy: Usually invests via accelerator programs and referrals, but reads concise cold decks from LatAm founders.
